description: This file defines a React component for an Animals page in a wildlife monitoring system, implementing functionality such as listing, viewing details, creating, updating, and deleting animal records, and interfacing with backend APIs.

methods.name: Animals()
methods.description: Main React component rendering the animals page with CRUD operations.

methods.name: loadAnimals
methods.description: Fetches the list of animals from the API and updates state.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selecting an animal to view its details.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Handles creation of a new animal record via API.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Handles updating an existing animal record.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of an animal record.
